alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Dale and Coffee Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1144 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elba, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, New Brockton, Ariton, Lee, Mixons Crossroads, Hunt Field, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Roeton, Cairns Aaf and Dale County Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama.
